text: @TerryMoran I think it’s the look the President of the United States needs to show in order to demonstrate the severity of the Coronavirus problem and the need for the whole country to do the same thing to solve the problem. It’s the RIGHT look under the current circumstances.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
